Prologue: Yours is a great strength to be measured against, but I daresay I am drawing closer by the day. Would you not agree?
Epilogue: Yours is a great strength to be judged against, but I do believe I'm improving. Would you not agree?

Prologue: Leave your next foe to me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. They will make good sport for my training!
Epilogue: Leave your next foe to me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. I could use a good challenge for my training!

Prologue: These trials seem unending─a true test of my will. I was not expecting such hardship.
Epilogue: These trials are unrelenting─a true test of my resolve. I was not expecting such hardship.

Prologue: My will would have broken long ago without you at my side. But together, I feel we can stand against any foe!
Epilogue: My resolve would surely have broken long ago were you not at my side. But together, I feel no challenge is too great!

Prologue: What is that look, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>? Do you fear for my well-being? Worry not! Our battles together have only just begun.
Epilogue: What is that gaze, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>? Do you fear for my safety? You needn't worry so. Our battles together are far from over!

Prologue: Are you certain this will work? What if I... No, I mustn't think such foolish things. Come, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, let us seek new foes!
Epilogue: Are you sure this will work? What if I... No, I mustn't doubt myself. Not now. Come, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, let us seek a new challenge!

Prologue: Absorbing aether is so much easier now. I feel myself growing stronger with every battle!
Epilogue: Absorbing aether is so much easier now. With every triumph I feel my power increasing!

Prologue: Am I living up to your expectations? I realize there is much I might yet do to prove myself to you.
Epilogue: I do hope I am meeting your expectations. Though I realize there is much I must yet do to prove myself to you.

Prologue: The strength you have bestowed upon me is changing somehow... It feels more...focused.
Epilogue: The strength you have lent me is changing somehow... It feels more...focused.

Prologue: Just a bit more... Yes, I sense that great power is nearly within reach.
Epilogue: Just a little more... Yes, I sense that great power is nearly within my grasp.

Prologue: This power is unlike anything I've experienced before. So intense, so focused. I... I think I'm ready, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
Epilogue: This power is unlike anything I've experienced before. So intense, so focused. I... I think I'm ready, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
